comment__: Number of threads to use for hyper parameter tuning
Number of threads to use for Meta simulation, running a number of simulations and taking the average of them
Number of simulation samples to compute to use for Meta simulation, running a number of simulations and taking the average of them
Name of the parameters that we want to tune
Parameter bounds, for which values will be sampled
Number of samples to evaluation between the given bounds
The fully qualified name of the mail server to use
Flag to say this is a testing run
Type of curve to blend values along [linear|squared|exponential]
